short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Application can be used to preview your HTML code as u write the code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most if us learning HTML feel lazy to write code and save it and then run it, well this application is made to make u much more lazy by displaying the result of your html code as u write it.
just write your html code on left side and see a preview of your code on right side
